snippet: In a new report card on Apple's energy practices for its data centers, the power-hungry server factories from which iCloud and other online Apple services run, Greenpeace International was somewhat kinder to the company than it had been in an earlier...
abstract: In a new report card on Apple's energy practices for its data centers, the power-hungry server factories from which iCloud and other online Apple services run, Greenpeace International was somewhat kinder to the company than it had been in an earlier assessment.

headline.main: Greenpeace Urges Apple to Think Cleaner
